vulnerabilities.title: depath and cool-path vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via `set()` Method
vulnerabilities.description: janryWang products depath v1.0.6 and cool-path v1.1.2 were discovered to contain a prototype pollution via the set() method at setIn (lib/index.js:90). This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via injecting arbitrary properties.
